member.name: T:HydroDesktop.DataDownload.SearchLayersProcessing.ThemeManager
member.summary: The ThemeManager is responsible for reading themes from the database and converting them to feature sets which can be displayed in the map. It also keeps track of added or deleted themes and notifies other HydroDesktop plug-ins to refresh their view when a theme is created, modified or deleted

member.name: M:HydroDesktop.DataDownload.SearchLayersProcessing.ThemeManager.GetFeatureSet(System.Int32)
member.summary: Given a theme, create a feature set. The theme already needs to have been saved in the database and the themeID needs to be a valid ID

member.name: M:HydroDesktop.DataDownload.SearchLayersProcessing.ThemeManager.GetFeatureSet(System.String)
member.summary: Given a theme name, create a feature set. The theme already needs to be present in the database.
member.exception: Throws when such theme not found in the database

member.name: M:HydroDesktop.DataDownload.SearchLayersProcessing.ThemeManager.TableToFeatureSet(System.Data.DataTable,DotSpatial.Projections.ProjectionInfo)
member.summary: given a data table, create an in-memory point feature set. The feature set must have the 'Latitude' and 'Longitude' numeric columns
member.param: The projection of the theme feature set
member.returns: A point FeatureSet in the WGS-84 coordinate system All columns of the data table will be converted to attribute fields
